On Thu, Jan 23, 2025 at 2:17?PM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	This was a response I got from IT regarding the software review.  We are good to go. 

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work

	 

	 

	From: Eugene Service Desk <Service.Desk@ci.eugene.or.us Service.Desk@ci.eugene.or.us > 
	Sent: Thursday, January 23, 2025 2:16 PM
	To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: SR2412_0888 - Flock Safety Software Review Request

	 

	Hi Travis and Jake. Good news - the software review of Flock Safety is complete and approved, with the condition that you use SSO. I will create a "CI" for it so it appears on the approved software list. 

	Please let me know if you have any questions. 

	Thanks,

	Margot, ISD

	 

	------ do not delete below this line ---------

	@OPERATION@='MAIL' @RFC_NUMBER@='SR2412_0888'

	 

	@OPERATION@='MAIL'
	@REQUEST_ID@='106602'
